data.eml:eml: Review of Cosmocomoidea (Hymenoptera: Mymaridae) from China, with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aishan, Zhulidezi, Triapitsyn, Serguei V., Xu, Mei, Lin, Nai-Quan, Hu, Hong-Ying (2016): Review of Cosmocomoidea (Hymenoptera: Mymaridae) from China, with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 4085 (4): 525-535, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4085.4.4
